data.fullContent: Tina and Kelly are regulars at the local pub on the corner. They don't even like drinking very much; they keep going back for the social atmosphere. On Sunday nights, the pub has live music, and on weekdays they go to watch sports games. By now, they are good friends with the bartender.
data.answer: 蒂娜和凯莉是街角当地酒吧的常客。他们甚至不太喜欢喝酒;为了营造社交氛围，他们经常去酒吧。星期天晚上，酒吧有现场音乐表演，工作日他们去看体育比赛。现在，他们和酒保是好朋友。
